title: US Releases Footage of Baghdadi Raid
text:
The US military released footage on October 30 showing the raid that killed IS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi days earlier.

Baghdadi was killed on the evening of October 26 during a raid on his hideout west of the town of Barisha in Syria’s Idlib Governorate carried out by US Special Forces.

CENTCOM commander General Frank McKenzie released footage and videos of the raid during a press conference on October 30.

CENTCOM also shared portions of the footage on its official Twitter account. Credit: US Department of Defense via Storyful
